entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
